column4: How do you install a new theme in ubuntu 11.10 ? Do you have to manually install it in /usr/share?  Because the current appearance allows now way of installing themese
You normally should be able to drag the tarball onto the theme list to install it
right .. but in 11.10 it seems they give you a list and you either choose from that or you're S.O.L at least on my attempts. Have you tried it on 11.10 and that worked for you ?
Sorry but 11.10 is not supported here.
